非常好玩的游戏，虽然类型是FPS,但是不需要紧张的杀敌，只要冷静的头脑就可以了。唯一的不足是游戏有点短，一天就能通关，而且编辑器没有教程。

Dies ist ein Spiel, das Sie auf jeden Fall kaufen, wenn Sie wollen Puzzle-Spiele mit einem Twist, 2 ziemlich einfach Bosskämpfe, tolle Spiel Spaß macht, hat mich am Ende weinen. Teile sind anspruchsvoll, manche sind einfach. Sie gingen mit einem anderen System der Aufnahme von Energiepellets, und ersetzte sie durch Laser. Und das ist ein kleiner Tipp für den Endgegner: Er wirft Bomben auf Sie, und er hat einen bombensicheren schild, dass er nur in eine Richtung zu lenken, aber Sie zuerst zerstören musst eine Tube Gel Umwandlung. Ich habe es jetzt ein bisschen einfacher, aber die Sache ist, ich will nicht alles verderben, ich will nur sagen, über heikle Teile, wie der Endgegner kämpfen. Zu genießen.
Great Game.

Portal 2 ist perfekt.
Es ist eins der Spiele die immer in Erinnerung bleiben werden.
Die Animationen, die Grafik, die Figuren und vorallem die Dialoge machen das Spiel so einzigartig.
Ein First-Person-Puzzle in welches man sich verlieben kann.
15€ oder im Sale auch weniger, jeder Cent ist es Wert.
Das Spiel bietet eine super Story, ist einem dies nicht genug, der kann sich Mod's herunterladen um Portal 2 zu erweitern. Einen Co-Op bietet Portal 2 natürlich auch.
Ich empfehle die Erweiterung "Portal: Mel Stories"
Uno de mis juegos favoritos, y de los mejores juegos de la historia. Demuestra que una secuela puede mejorar un juego, que de por si ya me encantó, el Portal 1,

Absoulutely amazing sarcastic game 
I love it!!

A different beast compared to the first, but definitely still Portal. A lot has been added to the second installment; new ways to interact with physics, several new characters as well as further development of characters from the first, new puzzles, new environments and backdrops, plus a longer campaign in general. All of which has been masterfully crafted. If you enjoyed the first, there's a lot to like in the second.
Awesome game, really makes you think!

Incredible masterpiece! One of the best games to date. Awesome story, awesome puzzles, awesome voice acting. Also great to Steam in-home stream on Ethernet to 2.4Ghz band from 1080p @60FPS to 768p @60FPS
Игра просто супер ,немного логики ,немного экшена )ПРосто купите и играйте.

I was reluctant to buy this because Portal 1 was very short and focused a bit too much on the puzzles (yeah, I know it wasn't a stand-alone game). In Portal 2 the balance is just perfect. It's still mostly puzzles, but there is a plot with twists, and it's long enough to keep you entertained for a while.

This game is small, but effective. Very humerous and can also get alittle dark at points. Story is great and the multiplayer is fantastic. However play through it once and you know everything.

An awesome sequel to Portal!

As I said about Portal, this game contains a rich storyline that follows up the one from it predecessor seamlessly. It could start off a little bit confusing if you haven't played Portal first, but if you have, it'll feel like you're just progressing within the same game/story (well technically it is the same story, part 2).

The portal gun still works the same, the puzzles are the same style, but there are now a little bit more (lethal) extra's. You will also learn a lot about the history of aperture science, and again: don't mind taking a look around.

I do recommend you to also play Portal, it'll provide you with a better context for the storyline.

Just WOW 
one of my favorite games of all time 
also the multiplayer is fun but you should play it with someone who has a headset
Замечательная игра. Хорошее звуковое сопровождение. Много интересных уровней в кооперативе и прекрасный сюжет. Видно, что разработчики хорошо постарались

This Game is Brilliant! Love the music, sound effects, the storyline, the voice acting and the environments. Best puzzle game made ever! the singleplayer campaign of game continues 7 hours, co-op mode storyline is a sequel to the singleplayer only in timeline and it's pretty quite short that can last only 2-3 hours. As the Singleplayer mode takes place before the co-op mode, however. If you want the origins about the characters you're using from the Co-op. Play the Singleplayer mode if you want to know where the robots come from. Overall! Hilarious dialogue, great gameplay, Co-op can sometimes bring chaotic mayhem, recommend this game if you love Puzzle Game and VALVe games.

Amazing game. Continues to receive fanmade content to this day. Really disappointing that Valve basically abandoned it. It definitely has a different energy than the first one, and it's a lot less tight, but imo Portal 1 is pretty much the perfect game so it was already a tough act to follow in the first place.

Ещё одна прекраснейшая и интересная игра от всеми любимой студии Valve, Portal 2 игра головоломка, которая заставит вас задуматся над каждой отдельной отведённой задачей, игра имеет отличный геймплей, хороший сюжет, большое количество сложных миссий как в одиночной так и в кооперативной играх, прекрасная графика, множество увлекательных, разнообразных и интересных часов в игре, если же вы всё ещё задумываетесь стоит ли вам купить Portal 2 моё мнение однозначно стоит.

Other than the fact I crash a lot, the fun makes up for it. I highly suggest this game. It really makes you think and lets you dive into the problem solving part of your brain. This game also includes a co-op mode where you and your friends can combine brain power and solve puzzles together to save SCIENCE! Sorry... lost my cool there for a sec... Then again, how can I lose something I never had? :p2cube:

1 Of The Best Games In The World

Portal 2 is really great puzzle game that is challenging and fun. Like it's predecessor, Portal 1 it's based around shooting portal to white walls and getting to the door,you have the orange portal and the blue portal. It has a campaign mod and a co-op mode. The campaign is comedic and fun for teh most part and the co-op mode, well i never touched that because i have no friends :(. There's also community maps in this game or you can make a custom map yourself using the map editor that is included in the game or using hammer. so yeah... buy this game!

The well-polished successor to the modern classic.  The story builds on its predecessor while generating a plethora of twists that keep you (incorrectly) guessing what will be next.  Also short, but this game adds replay value though coop.  A must-have for any gamer.

This is one of the best games i've ever played if not the best, the single player mode have an amazing story and take a fair time to finish, while the co-op mode is a really enjoyable experience with its own story worth playing by itself, it's not just playing Portal with someone else as i thought it would be (which would funny by itself) but is in fact much more  than just that, makes you think really hard and requires real cooperation, if you don't comunicate with your partner you're screwed. Definitively worth your money and time.

This game is simply awesome.  Words cannot describe how awesome.  There are portals.  There are potatoes.  It gives you plenty of hints as to what the truth might be without telling you.  And you get to fling yourself and gobs of bouncy blue paint across the world.
BEST. GAME. EVER.
